content.question: Which of the following best illustrates the flow of information required for the synthesis of proteins encoded in the genome of a retrovirus?

choices.label: The figure presents a sequence of three molecules. The first is D N A and an arrow points to the second, R N A. An arrow points from R N A to the third, Protein.
The figure presents a sequence of three molecules. The first is R N A and an arrow points to the second, D N A. An arrow points from D N A to the third, Protein.

The figure presents a sequence of four molecules. The first is R N A and an arrow points to the second, D N A. An arrow points from D N A to the third, another molecule of R N A.  An arrow points from the R N A to the fourth, Protein.

The figure presents a sequence of four molecules. The first is D N A and an arrow points to the second, R N A. An arrow points from R N A to the third, another molecule of D N A.  An arrow points from the D N A to the fourth, Protein.

content.answer: The figure presents a sequence of four molecules. The first is R N A and an arrow points to the second, D N A. An arrow points from D N A to the third, another molecule of R N A.  An arrow points from the R N A to the fourth, Protein.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
